header.description: Passionate problem solver and code enthusiast, dedicated to designing and developing innovative solutions with precision and creativity.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph_1: Hey there! 👋 I'm Sérgio Félix, a junior software engineer with the ability to turn code into creative digital experiences ✨. I've always had a fascination with computers, but it wasn't until 2017, when I started a Professional Course in Management and Programming of Computer Systems, that I first dipped my toes into the world of programming.
about.paragraph_2: I enjoyed it, but it wasn't until 2020, when I dove into the Higher Professional Technical Course in Development for Web and Mobile Devices, that everything clicked. 😮 It was like opening a treasure chest full of new cool stuff rather than PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap — only to realize there's a whole galaxy of tech out there! 🌌
about.paragraph_3: Right now, I'm deep into finishing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering and eyeing a Master's in Computer Engineering (maybe 🙃) in the future. I'm always on the lookout for new ways to flex my coding muscles and bring ideas to life whether through academic, personal, or professional projects.
about.paragraph_4: I'm driven by curiosity and a love for learning, which keeps me tinkering and picking up new skills. Whether it's in my sweet spot building a sleek web application or in my nightmare solving a tricky bug 💀, I'm all about delivering top-notch solutions that make an impact.
about.paragraph_5: So, if you're in need of a passionate and versatile software engineer who's ready to dive into exciting projects, let's connect! I'm eager to help turn your vision into reality. 😎
